void DzLegacyJointSphere::setByMatrix ( const DzMatrix4 &  inMat,
bool  makeDefault = false 
) [slot]

Sets the values of the properties by decomposing the given matrix into its components. Not all matrices can be accurately represented by decomposition into translation, scale, and rotation - matrices that have been composed with other transformations may not be accurately reproduced.

Parameters:
inMat The matrix to set the property values from.
makeDefault If true, the decomposed values will also be set as the defaults for the properties.
void DzLegacyJointSphere::setPath ( const QString &  name  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the group that the properties belonging to this sphere will belong to based on the given path.

Reimplemented from DzElement.

void DzLegacyJointSphere::startLoad ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [virtual]

Note: Save of .daz is deprecated in favor of duf/dsf. Developers are encouraged to support backwards compatibility, but new functionality need not support .daz.

Called by the framework just before section loading for this object begins. Derived classes can override this method to perform preparatory operations to reading their file data.

Parameters:
file The file being read.

Reimplemented from DzBase.
